summary: This evening’s clip hit me really hard because... I’m not taking my meds right now, and I’m hiding it from my parents so they...
body: This evening’s clip hit me really hard because… I’m not taking my meds right now, and I’m hiding it from my parents so they won’t yell at me, and Eliott was talking about a similar issue and I just realise all over again how similar I am to him.

summary: This is random but after sobbing my heart out over this clip i can't help but thinking whether Eliott will pass his bac or not?...
question: This is random but after sobbing my heart out over this clip i can't help but thinking whether Eliott will pass his bac or not? Will he even take it? Bc we know his attendance is tragic. I hope he doesnt repeat again, it'll hurt his confidence, and he doesnt even have it that much in the first place. Someone need to write this fic to ease my worries or just make s5 about him to solve this problem lmaoo. To think that im this worried over fictional character well being says a lot
answer:
Ahhhh man i am so there with you. I have to say I passed the French high school end exam and it was very stressful and difficult. I don’t think Eliott has been in very good conditions to succeed recently tbh. But it’s in June, there’s still time ! And in any case, even if it takes a bit more time for him to graduate, we all know he’s going to have an amazing life, with Lucas at his side.

And I’m crazy busy rn with the @renewskamfrance campaign rn but you can bet once that slows down a little I am going to be writing soooo much about their future lives <3

summary: Ok im probably gonna make no sense at all but i went back to watch skamfr s1&2 and it honestly sucks that the team didnt try to...
question: Ok im probably gonna make no sense at all but i went back to watch skamfr s1&2 and it honestly sucks that the team didnt try to make it their own like they did brilliantly in s3. Certain characters were sooo different from their og counterparts but for the sake of copying the story as closely as possible it felt like they were almost forced to do certain things that just felt ooc. Lucas never came off as manipulative or conniving? The whole snaking emma thing just felt so ooc and forced
answer:
Hey love,

It’s not that they didn’t try to make it their own. They just couldn’t because of the contracts. Which yeah, inevitably affected those seasons in a negative light. But I know a lot of people who loved the first two seasons so ya know, to each their own hahaha 😄💞

reblog.comment:
Hey love,

It’s not that they didn’t try to make it their own. They just couldn’t because of the contracts. Which yeah, inevitably affected those seasons in a negative light. But I know a lot of people who loved the first two seasons so ya know, to each their own hahaha 😄💞

blog.name: renewskamfrance
blog.title: Skam France S5
blog.description: This is a blog to campaign for a s5 (and more) of Skam France. Sign the Petition . Follow us on Twitter and Instagram. Find our collected Fan Stories Share what a season 5 would mean to you with #renewskamfrance or submit a post. Let's make some noise ! Header by Noelia

body:
Campaign day 3 :

Our teams are running like a well oiled machine, we are now at 458 followers on this blog, 1541 on Instagram, 260 on twitter.

And our petition has 7701 signatures ! Wow.

Our main goal is now to reach 10k.

Today we focused on why we wanted Eliott as main, and the answers were pretty overwhelming. He’s really touched so many lives. And with all of today’s clips, the timing was pretty amazing. We are so glad to have been able to hear him speak for himself.

Tomorrow, we will focus on a potential main who could bring a lot of joy into our lives 😁

Please keep sharing, supporting and telling us more about how skamfrance has changed your lives.

<3

Admin Ellie

summary: Can you believe how many times Skam France got called unrealistic when it gave us authentic representation of raw emotions and...
body:
Can you believe how many times Skam France got called unrealistic when it gave us authentic representation of raw emotions and plenty of important scenes? 

Maybe if you didn’t have your head stuck in og’s ass so bad, you would be able to smell excellence
